con:part.con:content: <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/faults/" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:faults="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/faults/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime"> <complexType name="ErrorMessage"> <sequence> <element name="ErrorField" type="string"/> <element name="ErrorMessageKey" type="string"/> <element name="ErrorDefaultMessage" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ServiceFault"> <sequence> <element name="message" type="string"/> <element name="exceptionMessage" type="string"/> <element name="faultInfo" type="string"/> <element name="errorList" type="faults:ErrorMessage" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="ServiceFaultException" type="faults:ServiceFault"/> </xsd:schema>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/online-card-payment/" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ocp="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/online-card-payment/" xmlns:cardpayment="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/online-card-payment/card-payment" xmlns:header="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/header/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime"> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/header/" schemaLocation="header.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/online-card-payment/card-payment" schemaLocation="card-payment.xsd"/> <xsd:element name="AuthoriseWithCardRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Header" type="header:MessageHeader"/> <xsd:element name="guid" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="paymentDetails" type="cardpayment:ServicePaymentDetails" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="cardDetails" type="cardpayment:ServiceCardDetails" nillable="false"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AuthoriseWithCardResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="result" type="cardpayment:ServiceAuthorisationResult"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AuthoriseWithTokenRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Header" type="header:MessageHeader"/> <xsd:element name="guid" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="paymentDetails" type="cardpayment:ServicePaymentDetails" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="cardDetails" type="cardpayment:ServiceCardDetails" nillable="false"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AuthoriseWithTokenResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="result" type="cardpayment:ServiceAuthorisationResult"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AuthoriseWithAuthenticationRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Header" type="header:MessageHeader"/> <xsd:element name="guid" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="paymentDetails" type="cardpayment:ServicePaymentDetails" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="cardDetails" type="cardpayment:ServiceCardDetails" nillable="false"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="authResponseData" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="cardpayment:ServiceNameValuePair"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="AuthoriseWithAuthenticationResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="result" type="cardpayment:ServiceAuthorisationResult"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema>

<wsdl:definitions name="online-card-payment-ws" targetNamespace="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/online-card-payment/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:online-card-payment-ws="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/online-card-payment/" xmlns:online-card-payment="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/online-card-payment/" xmlns:fault="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/faults/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/online-card-payment/" schemaLocation="online-card-payment-ws.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/header/" schemaLocation="header.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/faults/" schemaLocation="fault.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="onlineCardPaymentServiceFaultException"> <wsdl:part element="fault:ServiceFaultException" name="onlineCardPaymentServiceFaultException"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="authoriseWithCardRequest"> <wsdl:part name="authoriseWithCardRequest" element="online-card-payment:AuthoriseWithCardRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="authoriseWithCardResponse"> <wsdl:part name="authoriseWithCardResponse" element="online-card-payment:AuthoriseWithCardResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="authoriseWithTokenRequest"> <wsdl:part name="authoriseWithTokenRequest" element="online-card-payment:AuthoriseWithTokenRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="authoriseWithTokenResponse"> <wsdl:part name="authoriseWithTokenResponse" element="online-card-payment:AuthoriseWithTokenResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="authoriseWithAuthenticationRequest"> <wsdl:part name="authoriseWithAuthenticationRequest" element="online-card-payment:AuthoriseWithAuthenticationRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="authoriseWithAuthenticationResponse"> <wsdl:part name="authoriseWithAuthenticationResponse" element="online-card-payment:AuthoriseWithAuthenticationResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="online-card-payment-ws"> <wsdl:operation name="authoriseWithCard"> <wsdl:documentation>Attempts to authorisation a online card payment using the supplied card details. If the card provider insists upon a 3D authentication challenge this methods will return an unsuccessful AuthenticationResult object containing the 3D challenge data (challengeRequestData) required to perform the authentication process. Once this has been completed call the 'authoriseWithAuthentication()' operation with the resulting challengeResponseData to try and authorise the payment again.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="online-card-payment-ws:authoriseWithCardRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="online-card-payment-ws:authoriseWithCardResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="exception" message="online-card-payment-ws:onlineCardPaymentServiceFaultException"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="authoriseWithToken"> <wsdl:documentation>Attempts to authorisation a online card payment using the supplied token.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="online-card-payment-ws:authoriseWithTokenRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="online-card-payment-ws:authoriseWithTokenResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="exception" message="online-card-payment-ws:onlineCardPaymentServiceFaultException"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="authoriseWithAuthentication"> <wsdl:documentation>Attempts to authorisation a online card payment using the supplied 3D authentication challenge result data. To generate the 3D challenge result data you must call the createAuthenticationChallenge() operation.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input message="online-card-payment-ws:authoriseWithAuthenticationRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="online-card-payment-ws:authoriseWithAuthenticationResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="exception" message="online-card-payment-ws:onlineCardPaymentServiceFaultException"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="online-card-payment-ws-port" type="online-card-payment-ws:online-card-payment-ws"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="authoriseWithCard"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="exception"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="exception"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="authoriseWithToken"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="exception"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="exception"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="authoriseWithAuthentication"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="exception"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="exception"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="online-card-payment-ws"> <wsdl:port binding="online-card-payment-ws:online-card-payment-ws-port" name="online-card-payment-ws-port"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/online-card-payment-ws/onlineCardPayment"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/online-card-payment/card-payment" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:cardpayment="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/online-card-payment/card-payment" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime"> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceAuthorisationResult"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="outcome" type="cardpayment:ServiceAuthorisationOutcomeTypeEnum"/> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element name="code" type="xsd:int" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="processorTransactionId" type="xsd:string" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Provided by the external card payment processer</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="cardToken" type="xsd:string" nillable="true"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="authRequestData" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="cardpayment:ServiceNameValuePair"/> </xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="authTargetUrl" type="xsd:string" nillable="true"/> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="extra" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="cardpayment:ServiceNameValuePair"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServicePaymentDetails"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="currencyCode" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="amount" type="xsd:decimal" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="paymentRef" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="paymentType" type="cardpayment:ServicePaymentTypeEnum" nillable="false"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:simpleType name="ServiceAuthorisationOutcomeTypeEnum"> <!--Restricting the values to a set of value using 'enumeration'--> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="SUCCESS"/> <xsd:enumeration value="AUTHENTICATION_REQUIRED"/> <xsd:enumeration value="ERROR"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:simpleType name="ServicePaymentTypeEnum"> <!--Restricting the values to a set of value using 'enumeration'--> <xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"> <xsd:enumeration value="REGISTRATION_FEE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="EVENT_FEE"/> <xsd:enumeration value="REGULAR"/> <xsd:enumeration value="PAYMENT"/> </xsd:restriction> </xsd:simpleType> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceCardDetails"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="pan" type="xsd:string" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element name="maskedPan" type="xsd:string" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element name="startMonth" type="xsd:int" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element name="startYear" type="xsd:int" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element name="endMonth" type="xsd:int" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="endYear" type="xsd:int" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="issueNumber" type="xsd:int" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element name="token" type="xsd:string" nillable="true"/> <xsd:element name="securityInfo" type="cardpayment:ServiceCardSecurityInformation" nillable="true"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceCardSecurityInformation"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="csc" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Card Security Code 3 or 4 digits</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="houseNumber" type="xsd:int" nillable="true"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Apartment/House number or null if not applicable</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="postcode" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The numeric digits from the postcode e.g. W14 4RL becomes 144</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ServiceNameValuePair"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="Name" type="xsd:string" nillable="false"/> <xsd:element name="Value" type="xsd:string" nillable="true"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/header/" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:header="http://www.virginmoneygiving.com/type/header/"> <!--this common header should be in a separate resource component and shared by those that need it, instead this is a copy of what payment-management was/us using--> <complexType name="MessageHeader"> <sequence> <element name="SourceSystemId" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <simpleType> <restriction base="token"> <minLength value="1"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="SourceSubSystemId" type="token" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="BrandReference" type="token" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="SystemTransactionID" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <simpleType> <restriction base="token"> <minLength value="4"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> <element name="IPAddress" type="token"/> <element name="SessionID" type="token"/> <element name="UserName" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <simpleType> <restriction base="token"> <minLength value="4"/> </restriction> </simpleType> </element> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="MessageHeader" type="header:MessageHeader"/> </schema>
